Administration.text:
Type:
Diuretic
Dosage Forms:
Routes of Administration: oral
Common Trade Names: Dyrenium

Adult_Dosing.text:
Edema: 100-150 mg PO BID
Hypertension: 50-100 mg PO daily or in 2 divided doses

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
Safety/efficacy not established
0.5-2 mg/kg PO BID, max daily dose 300mg

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: C
Lactation risk: Infant risk cannot be ruled out
Renal dosing:
GFR >10: use 12h dosing interval
GFR <110 or creatinine >2.5: use not recommended
Hepatic dosing: contraindicated in severe liver impairment

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
Anuria, severe renal dysfunction
Hyperkalemia
Concomitant use of antikaliuretic agents, potassium supplementation/salt substitutes, or other potassium-sparing agents
Severe liver disease

Serious.text:
Hyperkalemia
Azotemia, nephrotoxicity
Jaundice
Megaloblastic anemia
Thrombocytopenia, purpura
Anaphylaxis

Hyperkalemia
Azotemia, nephrotoxicity
Jaundice
Megaloblastic anemia
Thrombocytopenia, purpura
Anaphylaxis

Mechanism_of_Action.text: Potassium-sparing diuretic: inhibits epithelial sodium channel in distal renal tubule
